analysis.reasoning: Gold demonstrates breakout continuation despite intraday pullback to 4175.01. Price recovered strongly to close at 4207.41, maintaining position well above all major moving averages. Momentum indicators remain bullish with RSI at 61.22 and MACD showing positive divergence. High volatility regime with mean-reverting properties supports continued upward momentum. Cross-asset context remains favorable with DXY showing low volatility and weak accumulation, while S&P500 and VIX maintain high volatility regimes typical of breakout environments.
